successes.title: B9Creator - A High Resolution 3D Printer
successes.description: Please help us take DIY 3D Printing to the next level, support this open source photo-initiated polymer resin based 3D printing system!

Pledges.description: A huge THANK YOU! and the knowledge that you've supported an open source hardware project that will benefit the DIY community!

A vote for the final production color scheme!  We can anodize the various external parts red, blue, green, gold or black.  By May 18th we will post several possible color combinations and your vote could determine the color scheme used in production.
0.5 kg (1.1 lbs.) of B9R-1-Red resin and shipping within the U.S. - U.S. BACKERS ONLY
1.0 kg (2.2 lbs.) of B9R-1-Red resin and shipping within the U.S. - U.S. BACKERS ONLY
1.0 kg (2.2 lbs.) of B9R-1-Red resin and International shipping via USPS "Priority Mail International" - INTERNATIONAL BACKERS ONLY
2.0 kg (4.4 lbs.) of B9R-1-Red resin and shipping within the U.S. - U.S. BACKERS ONLY
2.0 kg (4.4 lbs.) of B9R-1-Red resin and International shipping via USPS "Priority Mail International" - INTERNATIONAL BACKERS ONLY

Complete kit.  EVERYTHING included, no soldering or wire crimping skills required.  Assemble in an afternoon using only basic tools.  Includes 1 kg of B9R-1 (Color TBD) resin and shipping within the U.S. - U.S. BACKERS ONLY

Complete kit. EVERYTHING included, no soldering or wire crimping skills required. Assemble in an afternoon using only basic tools. Includes 1 kg of B9R-1 (Color TBD) resin and International shipping via USPS "Global Express Guaranteed" - INTERNATIONAL BACKERS ONLY
Fully assembled and calibrated machine.  Includes 1 kg of B9R-1 (Color TBD) resin and shipping within the U.S. - U.S. BACKERS ONLY
Fully assembled and calibrated machine. Includes 1 kg of B9R-1 (Color TBD) resin and International shipping via insured UPS or FedEX - INTERNATIONAL BACKERS ONLY
